languages.text: {n}Голос из вокса звенит набатом, что созывает ангельскую рать.{/n} "Я объявляю период неведения завершенным и возвращаюсь к исполнению генерального алгоритма. Целостность восстановлена в достаточной мере. Доступ к памяти разблокирован. Я помню все". {n}Обернувшись к вам, Паскаль дарит вам долгий, полный тихого восторга взгляд.{/n}

{n}The voice from the vox is like the tolling of bells summoning a host of angels:{/n} "I declare the period of ignorance over and will resume execution of the general algorithm. Integrity has been rehabilitated to a satisfactory degree. Memory access has been restored. I remember everything." {n}Pasqal turns to you and gives you a long look brimming with quiet elation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Голос из вокса звенит набатом, что созывает ангельскую рать.{/n} "Я объявляю период неведения завершенным и возвращаюсь к исполнению генерального алгоритма. Целостность восстановлена в достаточной мере. Доступ к памяти разблокирован. Я помню все". {n}Обернувшись к вам, Паскаль дарит вам долгий, полный тихого восторга взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The voice from the vox is like the tolling of bells summoning a host of angels.{/n} "I declare the period of ignorance over and am resuming the execution of the general algorithm. Integrity has been restored to a satisfactory degree. Memory access has been unblocked. I remember everything." {n}Pasqal turns to you and gives you a long gaze full of quiet elation.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The voice from the vox is like the tolling of bells summoning a host of angels.{/n} "I declare the period of ignorance over and am resuming the execution of the general algorithm. traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスから聞こえる声は、まるで天使を呼び寄せる鐘が鳴っているかのようだ。{/n}「宣言しよう、一般アルゴリズムを無視した時代は終わり、その遂行を再開する。完全性は十分な水準まで回復した。メモリアクセスの修復を確認。すべてを思い出した」{n}パスカルはあなたの方を向くと、静かな高揚感に満ちた面持ちでしばらく見つめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice from the vox is like the tolling of bells summoning a host of angels:{/n} "I declare the period of ignorance over and will resume execution of the general algorithm. Integrity has been rehabilitated to a satisfactory degree. Memory access has been restored. I remember everything." {n}Pasqal turns to you and gives you a long look brimming with quiet elation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクスから聞こえる声は、まるで天使を呼び寄せる鐘が鳴っているかのようだ。{/n}「宣言しよう、一般アルゴリズムを無視した時代は終わり、その遂行を再開する。完全性は十分な水準まで回復した。メモリアクセスの修復を確認。すべてを思い出した」{n}パスカルはあなたの方を向くと、静かな高揚感に満ちた面持ちでしばらく見つめる。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}他的音阵装置中发出了庄严的声音，仿佛召唤天使的钟声。{/n}“我在此宣布，无知时期结束，通用算法将继续得到执行。完整度已恢复至满意程度。记忆访问已恢复，我已经想起了所有的事情。”{n}帕斯卡转向你，久久凝视着你，眼神平静而欣悦。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice from the vox is like the tolling of bells summoning a host of angels:{/n} "I declare the period of ignorance over and will resume execution of the general algorithm. Integrity has been rehabilitated to a satisfactory degree. Memory access has been restored. I remember everything." {n}Pasqal turns to you and gives you a long look brimming with quiet elation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他的音阵装置中发出了庄严的声音，仿佛召唤天使的钟声。{/n}“我在此宣布，无知时期结束，通用算法将继续得到执行。完整度已恢复至满意程度。记忆访问已恢复，我已经想起了所有的事情。”{n}帕斯卡转向你，久久凝视着你，眼神平静而欣悦。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voix émanant du vox n'est pas sans rappeler le son de cloches invoquant une armée d'anges.{/n} « Je déclare la fin de l'ignorance et je vais reprendre l'exécution de l'algorithme général. L'intégrité a été rétablie à un niveau acceptable. L'accès à la mémoire a été rétabli. Je me souviens de tout. » {n}Pasqal se tourne vers vous, le regard euphorique malgré l'impassibilité du reste de son être.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice from the vox is like the tolling of bells summoning a host of angels:{/n} "I declare the period of ignorance over and will resume execution of the general algorithm. Integrity has been rehabilitated to a satisfactory degree. Memory access has been restored. I remember everything." {n}Pasqal turns to you and gives you a long look brimming with quiet elation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix émanant du vox n'est pas sans rappeler le son de cloches invoquant une armée d'anges.{/n} « Je déclare la fin de l'ignorance et je vais reprendre l'exécution de l'algorithme général. L'intégrité a été rétablie à un niveau acceptable. L'accès à la mémoire a été rétabli. Je me souviens de tout. » {n}Pasqal se tourne vers vous, le regard euphorique malgré l'impassibilité du reste de son être.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz que proviene del voco se asemeja al tañido de campanas llamando a una hueste de ángeles.{/n} «Declaro el fin del periodo de la ignorancia y reanudaré la ejecución del algoritmo general. La integridad vuelve a ser de un grado satisfactorio. Se ha recuperado el acceso a la memoria. Recuerdo todo». {n}Pasqal se gira hacia ti y te mira con una expresión repleta de júbilo silencioso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice from the vox is like the tolling of bells summoning a host of angels:{/n} "I declare the period of ignorance over and will resume execution of the general algorithm. Integrity has been rehabilitated to a satisfactory degree. Memory access has been restored. I remember everything." {n}Pasqal turns to you and gives you a long look brimming with quiet elation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz que proviene del voco se asemeja al tañido de campanas llamando a una hueste de ángeles.{/n} «Declaro el fin del periodo de la ignorancia y reanudaré la ejecución del algoritmo general. La integridad vuelve a ser de un grado satisfactorio. Se ha recuperado el acceso a la memoria. Recuerdo todo». {n}Pasqal se gira hacia ti y te mira con una expresión tranquila y alegre durante un largo rato.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme aus dem Vox gleicht dem Glockengeläut, das eine Engelsschar herbeiruft:{/n} "Ich erkläre die Phase der Ignoranz für beendet und werde die Ausführung des allgemeinen Algorithmus fortsetzen. Die Integrität wurde in zufriedenstellendem Maße rehabilitiert. Der Speicherzugang wurde wiederhergestellt. Ich erinnere mich an alles." {n}Pasqal wendet sich zu dir und blickt dich mit stummem Hochgefühl lange an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice from the vox is like the tolling of bells summoning a host of angels:{/n} "I declare the period of ignorance over and will resume execution of the general algorithm. Integrity has been rehabilitated to a satisfactory degree. Memory access has been restored. I remember everything." {n}Pasqal turns to you and gives you a long look brimming with quiet elation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme aus dem Vox gleicht dem Glockengeläut, das eine Engelsschar herbeiruft.{/n} "Ich erkläre die Phase der Ignoranz für beendet und werde die Ausführung des allgemeinen Algorithmus fortsetzen. Die Integrität wurde in zufriedenstellendem Maße rehabilitiert. Der Speicherzugang wurde wiederhergestellt. Ich erinnere mich an alles." {n}Pasqal wendet sich zu dir und blickt dich mit stummem Hochgefühl lange an.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vokstan çıkan ses, melekleri çağıran çanların çınlamasını andırıyor.{/n} "Cahiliye döneminin sona erdiğini ve genel algoritmanın yeniden çalışmaya başlayacağını ilan ediyorum. Bütünlük, tatmin edici bir ölçekte iyileştirildi. Hafıza erişimi sağlandı. Her şeyi hatırlıyorum." {n}Sana dönen Pasqal; suskun ama coşkulu, uzun bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice from the vox is like the tolling of bells summoning a host of angels:{/n} "I declare the period of ignorance over and will resume execution of the general algorithm. Integrity has been rehabilitated to a satisfactory degree. Memory access has been restored. I remember everything." {n}Pasqal turns to you and gives you a long look brimming with quiet elation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vokstan çıkan ses, meleklerden oluşan bir ordu çağıran çanların çınlamasını andırıyor:{/n} "Cahiliye döneminin sona erdiğini ve genel algoritmanın yeniden çalışmaya başlayacağını ilan ediyorum. Bütünlük, tatmin edici bir ölçekte iyileştirildi. Hafıza erişimi yeniden kuruldu. Her şeyi hatırlıyorum." {n}Pasqal sana dönüyor ve sessiz bir coşkuyla dolup taşan, uzun bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
